Description:
Detects the usage of the "Accesschk" utility, an access and privilege audit tool developed by SysInternal and often being abused by attacker to verify process privileges

Author: Teymur Kheirkhabarov (idea), Mangatas Tondang, oscd.community, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Permission Check Via Accesschk.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((product like '%accesschk' and description like '%reports effective permissions%' and (process_path like '%\accesschk.exe' or process_path like '%\accesschk64.exe') and original_file_name = 'accesschk.exe') and (command like '%uwcqv %' or command like '%kwsu %' or command like '%qwsu %' or command like '%uwdqs %'))
